message.content:
cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SOC, cs.CL 

The paper deals with social influence in online communities and proposes a probabilistic graphical model to learn the latent influence network. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories such as Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper focuses on recommendation systems, which could also place it in the sub-category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). However, given the emphasis on social influence and network inference, cs.SI and cs.IR seem to be the most likely sub-categories.
